question:
How many total credits are required for graduation in CAS?
A. 64
B. 96
C. 128
D. 144

How many points must be completed in residence (CAS coursework) to earn a CAS degree?
A. 32
B. 64
C. 96
D. 128

What is the minimum GPA required to graduate from CAS?
A. 1.5
B. 2.0
C. 2.5
D. 3.0

At least how much of a student's major must be completed in the College of Arts and Science?
A. One-fourth
B. One-third
C. One-half
D. All

What is the time limit to complete all requirements for a degree in CAS?
A. 4 years
B. 6 years
C. 8 years
D. No limit

Which of the following counts toward the 64-point CAS residency requirement?
A. NYU Abu Dhabi courses
B. NYU Shanghai courses
C. -UA study away courses
D. Courses from any NYU division

What is the policy on registering as a major?
A. Must be declared upon admission
B. Must be declared before graduation
C. Must be declared upon earning 64 credits
D. Must be declared after taking 3 major courses

To complete a major, what is the minimum GPA required in that major?
A. 1.5
B. 2.0
C. 2.5
D. 3.0

What is the required minimum GPA for completing a minor?
A. 1.5
B. 2.0
C. 2.5
D. 3.0

Which of the following statements is true about major courses taken outside NYU?
A. They are accepted automatically
B. They must be pre-approved by the Registrar
C. They are not accepted
D. They require a waiver

When are degrees conferred by the university?
A. Only in May
B. In May and December
C. In September, January, and May
D. Every month

What grade must be earned to count a course toward a major or minor?
A. D or better
B. C or better
C. C- or better
D. B or better

Can Pass/Fail courses be counted toward a major or minor?
A. Yes, with approval
B. No
C. Only for minors
D. Only for double majors

How many non-CAS NYU courses may count toward a CAS major for first-year matriculants?
A. 0
B. 1
C. 2
D. Unlimited

What must a transfer student complete to meet the CAS degree requirements?
A. 128 points total, 64 in CAS courses
B. 64 points total, 32 in CAS courses
C. 128 points total, 64 in non-CAS courses
D. 96 points total, all in CAS

What GPA must be maintained for a double major?
A. 1.5
B. 2.0
C. 2.5
D. 3.0

How many shared courses can be double-counted between two majors?
A. 0
B. 1
C. 2
D. 3

What is the minimum number of points students must complete in their final term at CAS?
A. 16
B. 32
C. 48
D. 64

When must students be registered in CAS to graduate?
A. Two semesters before graduation
B. Any time before graduation
C. The semester prior to graduation
D. After completing 128 credits

Which office handles petitions for exceptions to degree requirements?
A. Registrar
B. Dean of Students
C. Committee on Undergraduate Academic Standards
D. Department Chair
